message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $9,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down a little further. How about $10,500? This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and also fits within your budget.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your willingness to come down from $12,000 to $10,500, but I'm still a bit stretched on that price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. I'm happy to meet you halfway on our last offers. How about $10,000? This is the absolute lowest I can go, but it's still a good price for you considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still a bit short on budget, so I was thinking $9,200 would be a sweet spot for me. Can you consider that?
